abstract: Guy Hands’s private equity firm may go to court again in its battle with Citigroup, its lender in the $6.8 billion buyout.
snippet: Guy Hands’s private equity firm may go to court again in its battle with Citigroup, its lender in the $6.8 billion buyout.
lead_paragraph: Terra Firma, the private equity firm controlled by Guy Hands, is seeking to appeal a Federal District Court verdict that blocked its effort to recover as much as $8 billion from its star-crossed buyout of the EMI Group.

headline.main: Terra Firm Plans to Appeal EMI Ruling
